description: Detects an executable in the users directory started from one of the Microsoft Office suite applications (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Publisher, Visio)
author: Jason Lynch
name: Suspicious Binary In User Directory Spawned From Office Application
query: ((process.parent.executable.text:("*\\WINWORD.EXE" OR "*\\EXCEL.EXE" OR "*\\POWERPNT.exe" OR "*\\MSPUB.exe" OR "*\\VISIO.exe" OR "*\\MSACCESS.exe" OR "*\\EQNEDT32.exe") AND process.executable.text:"C\:\\users\\*" AND process.executable.text:"*.exe") AND (NOT process.executable.text:"*\\Teams.exe"))
